title: How to Make Spanakopita

steps.headline: Clean and wash the spinach well.
steps.description: Steam it in just a little water until tender. Drain and squeeze out any water and set it aside.

steps.headline: Chop the onion and sauté it in a little olive oil.
steps.description: Add well-drained spinach and braise for 5-6 minutes. Add pepper. Remove from heat and allow to cool.

steps.headline: Beat the eggs and mix them with the crumbled feta cheese.
steps.description: Stir in the spinach and onion mixture and the seasonings.

steps.headline: You can refrigerate the mixture for about 30 minutes if desired.
Melt the butter over low heat and keep it warm.
Use a knife to cut the phyllo sheets into strips about 4 inches (10cm) wide.
steps.description: You can cut a stack of several sheets at once.

steps.headline: As you go, brush each sheet of phyllo with warm melted butter.
steps.description: The butter makes the phyllo bake to a flaky crisp.

steps.headline: Place about a tablespoon of the feta mixture on one end of a strip of phyllo.
Fold the phyllo around the filling.
Lay the spanakopita on a baking sheet with a little space between them.
Bake at 375ºF (190ºC) for 15-20 minutes, until golden brown.

text: Clean and wash the spinach well. Steam it in just a little water until tender. Drain and squeeze out any water and set it aside. Chop the onion and sauté it in a little olive oil. Add well-drained spinach and braise for 5-6 minutes. Add pepper. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Beat the eggs and mix them with the crumbled feta cheese. Stir in the spinach and onion mixture and the seasonings. You can refrigerate the mixture for about 30 minutes if desired.  Melt the butter over low heat and keep it warm.  Use a knife to cut the phyllo sheets into strips about 4 inches (10cm) wide. You can cut a stack of several sheets at once. As you go, brush each sheet of phyllo with warm melted butter. The butter makes the phyllo bake to a flaky crisp. Place about a tablespoon of the feta mixture on one end of a strip of phyllo.  Fold the phyllo around the filling.  Lay the spanakopita on a baking sheet with a little space between them.  Bake at 375ºF (190ºC) for 15-20 minutes, until golden brown. Serve hot. Finished.
